subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Coach John Tortorella declined to discuss the slumps of Brad Richards and Rick Nash as the Rangers, trailing by 3-2 in their series against the Capitals, prepared for Sunday’s Game 6.
snippet: Coach John Tortorella declined to discuss the slumps of Brad Richards and Rick Nash as the Rangers, trailing by 3-2 in their series against the Capitals, prepared for Sunday’s Game 6.
